doc:
Franklin Dyall https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Franklin_Dyall 0 Franklin Dyall (3 February 1870 – 8 May 1950) was an English actor. Dyall was born in Liverpool. His father, Charles Dyall, was the first curator of the Walker Art Gallery. He appeared in 26 films between 1916 and 1948, as well as being the eleventh actor to portray Captain Hook. He was the father of actor Valentine Dyall. He died in Worthing, Sussex, aged 80. Franklin_Dyall ( 3_February_1870 – 8_May_1950 ) was an_English_actor . Dyall was_born in Liverpool . His_father , Charles_Dyall , was the_first_curator of the_Walker_Art_Gallery . He appeared in 26_films between 1916_and_1948 , as_well_as being the_eleventh_actor to_portray Captain_Hook . He was the_father of actor_Valentine_Dyall . He died in Worthing , Sussex , aged 80 .
